Like I said in previous chapter... I can’t see a happy ending. It is either her mother finds out and disown both of them (because both didn’t report the incident/situation from her), she commits suicide, the perpetrators kill her unintentionally or intentionally, one of them or both goes clinically insane (this chapter showed that this girl is already getting there… if not there already), Shou gets his life more screwed by killing the culprits... like I said is going to be a loss, loss situation = not happy ending. Heck, I don’t even see a bittersweet ending.
